statement: answer(Person) :- is_named_after("Milhouse", Person).
description: If Matt Groening named Milhouse, a character from Simpsons, after a person, then the answer is that person.

statement: answer(City) :- is_part_of("The Oberoi family", Hotel_company), has_a_head_office_in(Hotel_company, City).
description: If "The Oberoi family" is a part of a hotel company, and that hotel company has a head office in a city, then the answer is that city.

statement: answer(Company) :- is_about(Song, "a soul with incarnations in four different places in time and history"), is_recorded_by(Company, Song).
description: The answer is the company which recorded a song that is about a soul with incarnations in four different places in time and history.

statement: answer(City) :- has_population("Zhucheng", Population_of_Zhucheng), has_population("Pingquan", Population_of_Pingquan), Max_People = max(Population_of_Zhucheng, Population_of_Pingquan), has_population(City, Max_People).
description: If Zhucheng and Pinquan has some population, and a city has the population equal to the maximum of those two, then the answer is that city.

statement: answer(Person) :- Person = ("Jonathan Kellerman"; "P. G. Wodehouse"), has_nationality(Person, "America"), is_a(Person, "psychologist").
description: If the person is Jonathan Kellerman or P. G. Wodehouse, and the person is American, and is a psychologist, then the answer is that person.

statement: answer(Commmon_factor) :- have("Sarah Southern", Common_factor), have("George Osborne", Common_factor).
description: If Sarah Southern and George Osborne both have a common factor, then the answer is the common factor.

statement: answer(Town) :- is_located_in(Town, "Washington County, Maine"), is_located_in("Gallison Memorial Library", Town).
description: If a town is located in Washington County, Maine, and Gallison Memorial Library is located in the town, then the answer is that town.

statement: answer("yes") :- is_a("Jocelyn Moorhouse", "writer"), is_a("Jocelyn Moorhouse", "film director"), is_a("Arthur Berthelet", "writer"), is_a("Arthur Berthelet", "film director").
description: If Jocelyn Moorhouse and Arthur Berthelet both writers and film directors, then the answer is yes.

statement: answer(Date) :- occured_at("1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens", Date), formed("1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens", "Crater Glacier").
description: If the 1980 eruption of Mount St. Helens is occured at a date, and it formed the Crater Glacier, then the answer is that date.

statement: answer("yes") :- is_genus_of("Mimetes", ("subshrubs";"perennial herbs")), is_genus_of("Shortia", ("subshrubs";"perennial herbs")).
description: If Mimetes is a genus of subshrubs or perennial herbs, and Shortia is a genus of subshrubs or perennial herbs, then the answer is yes.

statement: answer(Team) :- is_a(Team, "professional NFL team"), played_for_after("Jeromey Clary", Team, "Kansas State Wildcats").
description: If a team is a professional NFL team, and Jeromey Clary played for the team after playing for Kansas State Wildcats, then the answer is that team.

statement: starring("The Last Outlaw", "Jack Luden").
description: The Last Outlaw stars Jack Luden.

statement: is_owned_by("Taybarns", "Whitbread").
description: Taybarns was owned by Whitbread.

statement: participated_at("Aerosmith", "Boston Strong charity concert").
description: The band Aerosmith performed as part of the "Boston Strong" charity concert.

statement: started_in("Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team", "1957").
description: Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team selection started in 1957.

statement: is_son_of("Prince Salim", "Akbar").
description: Akbar's son was named Prince Salim.

statement: is_from("White Witch", "Tampa, Florida").
description: White Witch was a glam rock/psychedelic/hard rock band from Tampa.

statement: win_award("Departures", "Best Drama at the Brownfish Short Film Festival").
description: "Departures" was named Best Drama at the Brownfish Short Film Festival in New York City in 2011.

statement: is_a("The New Zealand Democratic Party for Social Credit", "small leftist political party").
description: The New Zealand Democratic Party for Social Credit (shortened to Democrats for Social Credit) is a small leftist political party in New Zealand.

statement: involves("cropping", "taping to make the ears pointy").
description: Cropping sometimes involves taping to make the ears pointy.

statement: is_produced_by("Jesus Hits Like the Atom Bomb", "Eric Drew Feldman").
description: The album "Jesus Hits Like the Atom Bomb" was produced by Tripping Daisy.
